compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

C:\\polling-app\\backend\\serverless.yml.serviceRawFile:
service: poll-backend

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: ap-south-1
  stage: prod
  environment:
    MONGODB_URI: ${env:MONGODB_URI}
    JWT_SECRET: ${env:JWT_SECRET}
  timeout: 30
  memorySize: 512

functions:
  api:
    handler: handler.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: /{proxy+}
          method: ANY
          cors: true
      - http:
          path: /
          method: ANY
          cors: true

plugins:
  - serverless-offline

compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
